title: Delicate Diamond Bloom Necklace: Modern Vaddanam Touch
features: Floral motif necklace with individually prong-set brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a shimmering petal effect. Features a delicate cable chain and a secure lobster clasp. Subtle yet elegant, reminiscent of a modern take on the traditional Vaddanam/ఒడ్డాణము in a necklace format. Designed for comfort and everyday wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the sparkling white of the diamonds. A classic and timeless combination.
occasions: or adding a touch of sparkle to your everyday attire. Also suitable as a light bridal necklace for smaller ceremonies or pre-wedding functions like the Mehendi or Sangeet.
description: Combines the timeless appeal of diamonds with a modern design aesthetic. Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear. Showcases exceptional craftsmanship with its meticulous diamond setting. Versatile piece suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, designed for lasting beauty and value.
